content: in next st turn 49 51 57 63 67 75 sts row 4 skip first st slip_stitch in each of next 1 1 1 1 1 2 sts single_crochet 1 double_crochet across to last 3 3 3 3 3 4 sts single_crochet in next st turn 45 47 53 59 63 69 sts row 5 chain 3 skip first st decrease double_crochet across to last 3 sts decrease double_crochet 1 in last st turn 43 45 51 57 61 67 sts repeat last row 10 11 13 13 15 16 times 23 23 25 31 31 35 sts row 16 17 19 19 21 22 skip first st slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet across to last 3 sts single_crochet 1 turn 19 19 21 27 27 31 sts row 17 18 20 20 22 23 skip first st slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet across to last 3 sts single_crochet 1 turn 15 15 17 23 23 27 sts row 18 19 21 21 23 24 skip first st slip_stitch 1 1 2 2 2 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet across to last 3 3 4 4 4 3 sts single_crochet 1 turn 11 11 11 17 17 23 sts sizes l xl xxl only row 22 24 25 skip first st slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet to last 4 sts single_crochet 1 turn 11 11 17 sts size xxl only row 26 skip first st slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet to last 4 sts single_crochet 1 turn 11 sts fasten_off © 2009 julia vaconsin juliavaconsin@gmail com finishing wash and block all pieces to measurements close side seams and shoulder seams close sleeve seams and set in sleeves i used a woven seam also called mattress stitch for the side and underarm seams and back stitch for the shoulder seam and for setting in the sleeves interweave crochet had an excellent 2 part series on seaming techniques by annette petavy in its fall and winter 2008 issues but you should be able to find a lot of resources on how to work these seams on the internet as well © 2009 julia vaconsin juliavaconsin@gmail com button band with rs facing join color b to top corner of left front chain 1 single_crochet evenly along left front edge 2 single_crochet for every double_crochet row end turn 84 84 88 88 92 92 sts next row chain 1 single_crochet in first st and across turn repeat last row 5 more times fasten_off buttonhole band with rs facing join color b to bottom corner of right front chain 1 single_crochet evenly along right front edge turn 84 84 88 88 92 92 sts next row chain 1 single_crochet in first st and across turn repeat last row 1 more time buttonhole row chain 1 single_crochet 8 *chain 3 skip 3 single_crochet 11 repeat from * to last 6 6 10 10 14 14 sts chain 3 skip 3 single_crochet to end turn next row chain 1 single_crochet across working 3 single_crochet in each chain-3-space turn
